about_the_game:
"Eye See Fun" is an adventure and puzzle game that offers a rich combination of elements. In this game, players take control of an eye to interact with various objects in the scenes, unravel complex puzzles, and progressively unlock different environments. Adding to the excitement, players have the opportunity to assist non-playable characters (NPCs) in fulfilling their wishes within these diverse settings. It's not just a game; it's the tangible realization of the author's unique and imaginative ideas.
The game's design philosophy emphasizes a relaxed and enjoyable gaming experience, completely devoid of any violent or explicit content. It is suitable for players of all ages to unwind and immerse themselves in the delightful atmosphere.

"Eye See Fun" is an adventure and puzzle game that offers a rich combination of elements. In this game, players take control of an eye to interact with various objects in the scenes, unravel complex puzzles, and progressively unlock different environments. Adding to the excitement, players have the opportunity to assist non-playable characters (NPCs) in fulfilling their wishes within these diverse settings. It's not just a game; it's the tangible realization of the author's unique and imaginative ideas.
The game's design philosophy emphasizes a relaxed and enjoyable gaming experience, completely devoid of any violent or explicit content. It is suitable for players of all ages to unwind and immerse themselves in the delightful atmosphere.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS
  • Processor: 苹果 M1 或英特尔酷睿 M
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

name: Eye see fun
short_description: "Eye See Fun" is a casual adventure and puzzle game with the main character being an eye. Players engage in the game by manipulating the eye and interacting with objects in the scenes to solve puzzles and unlock different environments. The goal is to help the eye find its companion.
supported_languages: English, German, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, French, Russian, Japanese, Korean
